product_name: Clean Bottle Water Bottle - 24 fl. oz.
long_description: The clever Clean Bottle lets you easily access both ends of the bottle for quick, thorough cleaning! Clean Bottle features a patent-pending, leak-proof, screw-off bottom for easy access to the whole bottle for cleaning. Made with 100% non-toxic, BPA-free plastics. 10% of all Clean Bottle profits are donated to environmentally- and cycling-friendly charities.
short_description: The clever Clean Bottle lets you easily access both ends of the bottle for quick, thorough cleaning!
